SCTX:
Begin stal1Script

short stal1
float timer

if ( MenuMode == 1 )
	Return
endif

if ( OnActivate == 0 )
	Return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_Earth == 20 )
	Journal BM_Earth 30
endif

Act_BM_steam_01->Enable
PlaySound "BM pipe small"

if ( part == 2 )
	set stal1 to 1
elseif ( part == 6 )
	set stal1 to 2
elseif ( part == 9 )
	set stal1 to 3
else
	if ( part < 5 )
		set part to 0
	else
		set part to 6
	endif
	set Act_BM_pipe_02.stal2 to 0
	set Act_BM_pipe_03.stal3 to 0
endif

End stal1Script
